activities.name: ARDetail Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.ARDETAIL t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.ARDETAIL_STAGING s 
on t.ardetailuid = s.ardetailuid  
when matched then update set 
	ardetailuid = s.ardetailuid ,
      t.sourceuid = s.sourceuid ,
      t.status = s.status ,
      t.custid = s.custid ,
      t.siteid = s.siteid ,
      t.material = s.material ,
      t.detailtype = s.detailtype ,
      t.tax = s.tax ,
      t.debitacct = s.debitacct ,
      t.creditacct = s.creditacct ,
      t.period = s.period ,
      t.invoiceuid = s.invoiceuid ,
      t.transactiondate = s.transactiondate ,
      t.duedate = s.duedate ,
      t.glexportbatchuid = s.glexportbatchuid ,
      t.quantity = s.quantity ,
      t.unitrate = s.unitrate,
      t.originalamount = s.originalamount ,
      t.balance = s.balance ,
      t.billedappliedamount = s.billedappliedamount ,
      t.displayoninvoice = s.displayoninvoice ,
      t.detailsource = s.detailsource ,
      t.companyid = s. companyid ,
      t.createddatetime = s.createddatetime ,
      t.creditacctsegtype = s.creditacctsegtype ,
      t.debitacctsegtype = s.debitacctsegtype 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	ardetailuid ,
      t.sourceuid ,
      t.status ,
      t.custid ,
      t.siteid ,
      t.material ,
      t.detailtype ,
      t.tax ,
      t.debitacct ,
      t.creditacct ,
      t.period ,
      t.invoiceuid ,
      t.transactiondate ,
      t.duedate ,
      t.glexportbatchuid ,
      t.quantity ,
      t.unitrate ,
      t.originalamount ,
      t.balance ,
      t.billedappliedamount ,
      t.displayoninvoice ,
      t.detailsource ,
      t.companyid ,
      t.createddatetime ,
      t.creditacctsegtype ,
      t.debitacctsegtype 
	)
values 
	(
	 ardetailuid ,
      s.sourceuid ,
      s.status ,
      s.custid ,
      s.siteid ,
      s.material ,
      s.detailtype ,
      s.tax ,
      s.debitacct ,
      s.creditacct ,
      s.period ,
      s.invoiceuid ,
      s.transactiondate ,
      s.duedate ,
      s.glexportbatchuid ,
      s.quantity ,
      s.unitrate ,
      s.originalamount ,
      s.balance ,
      s.billedappliedamount ,
      s.displayoninvoice ,
      s.detailsource ,
      s.companyid ,
      s.createddatetime ,
      s.creditacctsegtype ,
      s.debitacctsegtype)'
	)}

activities.name: Drop staging table for AR Detail
GLExportBatch Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.GLEXPORTBATCH t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.GLEXPORTBATCH_STAGING s 
on t.GLEXPORTBATCHUID = s.GLEXPORTBATCHUID  
when matched then update set 
	t.glexportbatchuid = s.glexportbatchuid ,
	t.glexportbatchid = s.glexportbatchid,
	t.exportdatetime= s.exportdatetime ,
	t.status = s.status ,
	t.credittotal = s.credittotal ,
	t.debittotal = s.debittotal ,
	t.description = s.description ,
	t.filecount = s.filecount,
	t.batchtype = s.batchtype,
	t.companyid = s.companyid,
	t.period = s.period ,
	t.companylist = s.companylist ,
	t.periodlist = s.periodlist 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.glexportbatchuid,
	t.glexportbatchid ,
	t.exportdatetime,
	t.status ,
	t.credittotal ,
	t.debittotal ,
	t.description ,
	t.filecount ,
	t.batchtype ,
	t.companyid ,
	t.period ,
	t.companylist ,
	t.periodlist 
	)
values 
	(
	s.glexportbatchuid ,
	s.glexportbatchid ,
	s.exportdatetime,
	s.status ,
	s.credittotal ,
	s.debittotal ,
	s.description ,
	s.filecount ,
	s.batchtype ,
	s.companyid ,
	s.period ,
	s.companylist,
	s.periodlist)'
	)}

activities.name: Payment Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.PAYMENT t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.PAYMENT_STAGING s 
on t.PAYMENTUID = s.PAYMENTUID  
when matched then update set 
	t.paymentuid =s.paymentuid , 
	t.paymentbatchuid =s.paymentbatchuid , 
	t.batchsequence =s.batchsequence , 
	t.sourceuid =s.sourceuid, 
	t.paymentdate =s.paymentdate , 
	t.status =s.status, 
	t.clearornsfdate =s.clearornsfdate, 
	t.custid =s. custid , 
	t.paymentmethod =s.paymentmethod , 
	t.creditcardtype =s.creditcardtype, 
	t.paymentbankacct =s.paymentbankacct, 
	t.paymentidnbr =s.paymentidnbr, 
	t.amount =s.amount , 
	t.applicationmethod =s.applicationmethod , 
	t.removecredithold =s.removecredithold , 
	t.creditamount =s.creditamount , 
	t.creditreason =s.creditreason, 
	t.paymentnote=s.paymentnote ,  
	t.customerbalance =s.customerbalance, 
	t.bankaccountxrefuid =s.bankaccountxrefuid , 
	t.collectionsnotified =s.collectionsnotified, 
	t.customerpaymentaccountuid =s.customerpaymentaccountuid, 
	t.reversedbydate=s.reversedbydate , 
	t.reversedbyuserid =s.reversedbyuserid , 
	t.reversalreasonnote = s.reversalreasonnote  
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.paymentuid ,
	t.paymentbatchuid ,
	t.batchsequence ,
	t.sourceuid ,
	t.paymentdate ,
	t.status ,
	t.clearornsfdate ,
	t.custid ,
	t.paymentmethod ,
	t.creditcardtype ,
	t.paymentbankacct ,
	t.paymentidnbr ,
	t.amount ,
	t.applicationmethod ,
	t.removecredithold ,
	t.creditamount ,
	t.creditreason ,
	t.paymentnote, 
	t.customerbalance ,
	t.bankaccountxrefuid ,
	t.collectionsnotified ,
	t.customerpaymentaccountuid,
	t.reversedbydate,
	t.reversedbyuserid ,
	t.reversalreasonnote 
	)
values 
	(
	s.paymentuid ,
	s.paymentbatchuid ,
	s.batchsequence ,
	s.sourceuid ,
	s.paymentdate ,
	s.status ,
	s.clearornsfdate ,
	s.custid ,
	s.paymentmethod ,
	s.creditcardtype ,
	s.paymentbankacct ,
	s.paymentidnbr ,
	s.amount ,
	s.applicationmethod ,
	s.removecredithold ,
	s.creditamount ,
	s.creditreason ,
	s.paymentnote, 
	s.customerbalance ,
	s.bankaccountxrefuid ,
	s.collectionsnotified ,
	s.customerpaymentaccountuid ,
	s.reversedbydate,
	s.reversedbyuserid ,
	s.reversalreasonnote )'
	)}

activities.name: InvoiceDetail Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.INVOICEDETAIL t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.INVOICEDETAIL_STAGING s 
on t.INVOICEDETAILUID= s.INVOICEDETAILUID  
when matched then update set 
t.InvoiceDetailUID= s.InvoiceDetailUID,
      t.InvoiceUID= s.InvoiceUID,
      t.SiteID= s.SiteID,
      t.ServiceUID= s.ServiceUID,
      t.SourceUID= s.SourceUID,
      t.SourceIDNbr= s.SourceIDNbr,
      t.LineType= s.LineType,
      t.LineSubType= s.LineSubType,
      t.SvcCode= s.SvcCode,
      t.Description= s.Description ,
      t. Salesperson = s.Salesperson ,
      t.SvcFrequency= s.SvcFrequency ,
      t.Quantity= s.Quantity,
      t.Amount= s.Amount ,
      t.UnitPrice= s.UnitPrice,
      t.TaxAmount= s.TaxAmount,
      t.StartDate= s.StartDate,
      t.EndDate= s.EndDate ,
      t.PrintRecord= s.PrintRecord ,
      t.LineOrderKey1= s.LineOrderKey1 ,
      t.LineOrderKey2= s.LineOrderKey2 ,
      t.LineOrderKey3= s.LineOrderKey3 ,
      t.LineOrderKey4= s.LineOrderKey4 ,
      t.PONbr= s.PONbr ,
      t.POSource= s.POSource ,
      t.AssignedToCollections= s.AssignedToCollections ,
      t.AssignedToCollectionsDate= s.AssignedToCollectionsDate ,
      t.DiscountAmount= s.DiscountAmount,
      t.PriorARDStatus= s.PriorARDStatus ,
      t.LineLevel= s.LineLevel,
      t.SiteAddressUID= s.SiteAddressUID 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.InvoiceDetailUID,
      t.InvoiceUID,
      t.SiteID,
      t.ServiceUID,
      t.SourceUID,
      t.SourceIDNbr,
      t.LineType,
      t.LineSubType,
      t.SvcCode,
      t.Description,
      t.Salesperson,
      t.SvcFrequency,
      t.Quantity,
      t.Amount,
      t.UnitPrice,
      t.TaxAmount,
      t.StartDate,
      t.EndDate,
      t.PrintRecord,
      t.LineOrderKey1,
      t.LineOrderKey2,
      t.LineOrderKey3,
      t.LineOrderKey4,
      t.PONbr,
      t.POSource,
      t.AssignedToCollections,
      t.AssignedToCollectionsDate,
      t.DiscountAmount,
      t.PriorARDStatus,
      t.LineLevel,
      t.SiteAddressUID
	)
values 
	(
	s.InvoiceDetailUID,
      s.InvoiceUID,
      s.SiteID,
      s.ServiceUID,
      s.SourceUID,
      s.SourceIDNbr,
      s.LineType,
      s.LineSubType,
      s.SvcCode,
      s.Description,
      s.Salesperson,
      s.SvcFrequency,
      s.Quantity,
      s.Amount,
      s.UnitPrice,
      s.TaxAmount,
      s.StartDate,
      s.EndDate,
      s.PrintRecord,
      s.LineOrderKey1,
      s.LineOrderKey2,
      s.LineOrderKey3,
      s.LineOrderKey4,
      s.PONbr,
      s.POSource,
      s.AssignedToCollections,
      s.AssignedToCollectionsDate,
      s.DiscountAmount,
      s.PriorARDStatus,
      s.LineLevel,
      s.SiteAddressUID)'
	)}

activities.name: Invoice Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.INVOICE t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.INVOICE_STAGING s 
on t.INVOICEUID= s.INVOICEUID  
when matched then update set 
	t.invoiceuid = s.invoiceuid ,
	t.invoiceid = s.invoiceid ,
	t.status = s. status,
	t.invoicecontent = s.invoicecontent ,
	t.printinvoice = s.printinvoice ,

	t.totchargetaxes = s.totchargetaxes ,

	t.invoiceinsert = s.invoiceinsert ,
	t.externalinvoicenbr = s.externalinvoicenbr ,
	t.invoicedetailformat = s.invoicedetailformat ,
	t.lineofbusiness =s.lineofbusiness 
when not matched then insert 
	( 
	t.invoiceuid ,
	t.invoiceid ,

	t.billname ,
	t.billcontact,
	t.billaddressuid ,
	t.billphone ,
	t.billfax ,
	t.billemail ,
	t.siteaddressuid ,
	t.invoicedate ,
	t.lastinvoicedate ,
	t.duedate ,
	t.financechargethrudate ,
	t.custclass ,
	t.balforward ,
	t.agingbal00 ,
	t.agingbal01 ,
	t.agingbal02 ,
	t.agingbal03 ,
	t.agingbal04 ,
	t.newbalance ,
	t.totsvconetime ,
	t.totsvcrecurring ,
	t.totsvconcall ,
	t.totsvctaxes ,
	t.totfincharges ,
	t.totcharges ,
	t.totchargetaxes ,
	t.totcredits ,
	t.totcredittaxes ,
	t.totpayments ,
	t.automaticpaymenttype ,
	t.companyid ,
	t.invoicemailingoption ,
	t.invoiceinsert ,
	t.externalinvoicenbr ,
	t.invoicedetailformat ,
	t.lineofbusiness 
	)
values 
	(
	s.invoiceuid ,
	s.invoiceid ,
	s.status ,
	s.invoicecontent ,
	s.printinvoice ,
	s.invoiceorderkey ,
	s.billbatchuid ,
	s.billcustid ,
	s.billsiteid ,
	s.billname ,
	s.billcontact,
	s.billaddressuid ,
	s.billphone ,
	s.billfax ,
	s.billemail ,
	s.siteaddressuid ,
	s.invoicedate ,
	s.lastinvoicedate ,
	s.duedate ,
	s.financechargethrudate ,
	s.custclass ,
	s.balforward ,
	s.agingbal00 ,
	s.agingbal01 ,
	s.agingbal02 ,
	s.agingbal03 ,
	s.agingbal04 ,
	s.newbalance ,
	s.totsvconetime ,
	s.totsvcrecurring ,
	s.totsvconcall ,
	s.totsvctaxes ,
	s.totfincharges ,
	s.totcharges ,
	s.totchargetaxes ,
	s.totcredits ,
	s.totcredittaxes ,
	s.totpayments ,
	s.automaticpaymenttype ,
	s.companyid ,
	s.invoicemailingoption ,
	s.invoiceinsert ,
	s.externalinvoicenbr ,
	s.invoicedetailformat ,
	s.lineofbusiness)'
	)}

activities.name: Service History Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW. SERVICEHISTORY t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.SERVICEHISTORY_STAGING s 
on t.SERVICEHISTORYUID= s.SERVICEHISTORYUID 
when matched then update set
t.ServiceHistoryUID= s.ServiceHistoryUID,
      t.ServiceHistoryType= s.ServiceHistoryType,
      t.WorkflowCode= s.WorkflowCode,
      t.ServiceQueue= s.ServiceQueue,
      t.SourceUID= s.SourceUID,
      t.ServiceOrderID= s.ServiceOrderID,
      t.ServiceInfoUID= s.ServiceInfoUID,
      t.ServiceScheduleUID= s.ServiceScheduleUID,
      t.RescheduledHistoryUID= s.RescheduledHistoryUID,
      t.Status= s.Status,
      t.ReleasedToBilling= s.ReleasedToBilling,
      t.ReasonNote= s.ReasonNote,
      t.Route= s.Route,
      t.RouteSequence= s.RouteSequence,
      t.ServiceDate= s.ServiceDate,
      t.StartTime= s.StartTime,
      t.FinishTime= s.FinishTime,
      t.ServiceNote= s.ServiceNote,
      t.WorkOrderID= s.WorkOrderID,
      t.Quantity= s.Quantity,
      t.RequestedStartTime= s.RequestedStartTime,
      t.RequestedEndTime= s.RequestedEndTime,   
      t.LaborCost= s. LaborCost,
      t.NonLaborCost= s.NonLaborCost,
      t.OriginalServiceDate= s.OriginalServiceDate,
      t.GPSVerified= s.GPSVerified,
      t.Latitude= s.Latitude,
      t.LiftArmUsed= s.LiftArmUsed,
      t.Longitude= s.Longitude,
      t.AllocatedRevenue= s.AllocatedRevenue,
      t.DriverNotified= s.DriverNotified,
      t.DisposalTripUID= s.DisposalTripUID,
      t.OriginalWorkflowCode= s.OriginalWorkflowCode,
      t.UpsRoadNetSyncNotificationStatus= s.UpsRoadNetSyncNotificationStatus,
      t.GeocodeDifference= s.GeocodeDifference,
      t.GeocodeUpdate= s.GeocodeUpdate,
      t.AllocatedRebate= s.AllocatedRebate,
      t.PercentFull= s.PercentFull,
      t.CompletionSequence= s.CompletionSequence,
      t.Odometer= s.Odometer,
      t.RecurringRevenue= s.RecurringRevenue,
      t.Surcharges= s.Surcharges,
      t.WorkorderRevenue= s.WorkorderRevenue,
      t.ThirdPartyServiceCost= s.ThirdPartyServiceCost,
      t.ThirdPartyWorkorderCost= s.ThirdPartyWorkorderCost,
      t.HolidayScheduleUID= s.HolidayScheduleUID,
      t.SerialNbr= s.SerialNbr,
      t.syncRowVersion= s.syncRowVersion,
      t.WorkStartTime= s.WorkStartTime,
      t.WorkStopTime= s.WorkStopTime,
      t.RouteSubsectionUID= s.RouteSubsectionUID,
      t.ThirdPartyPONbr= s.ThirdPartyPONbr,
      t.ThirdPartyServiceProvider= s.ThirdPartyServiceProvider,
      t.CompletedByVehicle= s.CompletedByVehicle,
      t.PickupEquivalent= s.PickupEquivalent,
      t.PickupEquivalentAdjustment= s.PickupEquivalentAdjustment,
      t.PickupEquivalentIsBilled= s.PickupEquivalentIsBilled,
      t.StatusSource = s.StatusSource 
when not matched then insert 
    ( 
t.ServiceHistoryUID,
      t.ServiceHistoryType,
      t.WorkflowCode,
      t.ServiceQueue,
      t.SourceUID,
      t.ServiceOrderID,
      t.ServiceInfoUID,
      t.ServiceScheduleUID,
      t.RescheduledHistoryUID,
      t.Status,
      t.ReleasedToBilling,
      t.ReasonNote,
      t.Route,
      t.RouteSequence,
      t.ServiceDate,
      t.StartTime,
      t.FinishTime,
      t.ServiceNote,
      t.WorkOrderID,
      t.Quantity,
      t.RequestedStartTime,
      t.RequestedEndTime,
      t.LaborCost,
      t.NonLaborCost,
      t.OriginalServiceDate,
      t.GPSVerified,
      t.Latitude,
      t.LiftArmUsed,
      t.Longitude,
      t.AllocatedRevenue,
      t.DriverNotified,
      t.DisposalTripUID,
      t.OriginalWorkflowCode,
      t.UpsRoadNetSyncNotificationStatus,
      t.GeocodeDifference,
      t.GeocodeUpdate,
      t.AllocatedRebate,
      t.PercentFull,
      t.CompletionSequence,
      t.Odometer,
      t.RecurringRevenue,
      t.Surcharges,
      t.WorkorderRevenue,
      t.ThirdPartyServiceCost,
      t.ThirdPartyWorkorderCost,
      t.HolidayScheduleUID,
      t.SerialNbr,
      t.syncRowVersion,
      t.WorkStartTime,
      t.WorkStopTime,
      t.RouteSubsectionUID,
      t.ThirdPartyPONbr,
      t.ThirdPartyServiceProvider,
      t.CompletedByVehicle,
      t.PickupEquivalent,
      t.PickupEquivalentAdjustment,
      t.PickupEquivalentIsBilled,
      t.StatusSource
)
Values
(
s.ServiceHistoryUID,
      s.ServiceHistoryType,
      s.WorkflowCode,
      s.ServiceQueue,
      s.SourceUID,
      s.ServiceOrderID,
      s.ServiceInfoUID,
      s.ServiceScheduleUID,
      s.RescheduledHistoryUID,
      s.Status,
      s.ReleasedToBilling,
      s.ReasonNote,
      s.Route,
      s.RouteSequence,
      s.ServiceDate,
      s.StartTime,
      s.FinishTime,
      s.ServiceNote,
      s.WorkOrderID,
      s.Quantity,
      s.RequestedStartTime,
      s.RequestedEndTime,
      s.LaborCost,
      s.NonLaborCost,
      s.OriginalServiceDate,
      s.GPSVerified,
      s.Latitude,
      s.LiftArmUsed,
      s.Longitude,
      s.AllocatedRevenue,
      s.DriverNotified,
      s.DisposalTripUID,
      s.OriginalWorkflowCode,
      s.UpsRoadNetSyncNotificationStatus,
      s.GeocodeDifference,
      s.GeocodeUpdate,
      s.AllocatedRebate,
      s.PercentFull,
      s.CompletionSequence,
      s.Odometer,
      s.RecurringRevenue,
      s.Surcharges,
      s.WorkorderRevenue,
      s.ThirdPartyServiceCost,
      s.ThirdPartyWorkorderCost,
      s.HolidayScheduleUID,
      s.SerialNbr,
      s.syncRowVersion,
      s.WorkStartTime,
      s.WorkStopTime,
      s.RouteSubsectionUID,
      s.ThirdPartyPONbr,
      s.ThirdPartyServiceProvider,
      s.CompletedByVehicle,
      s.PickupEquivalent,
      s.PickupEquivalentAdjustment,
      s.PickupEquivalentIsBilled,
      s.StatusSource)'
)}

activities.name: Drop staging table for Service History
